arts.ttl: Barcelona suffer serious blow as key forward ruled out ahead of Girona match
arts.sum: Barcelona have suffered a major setback ahead of their La Liga match against Girona, as Ferran Torres has been ruled out of the game, according to SPORT. The forward missed Friday’s final training session, confirming that he will not feature in the match immediately after the international break. arts.ttl: Girona defender hails Barcelona talent as future top player – ‘ Will be one of the greats’
arts.sum: Girona defender Vitor Reis, currently on loan from Manchester City, is set to face Barcelona in La Liga this Saturday. The 19-year-old Brazilian was once linked with a move to Barça, but the transfer never happened as he ended up joining Manchester City in 2024. arts.ttl: La Masia prospect could earn crucial minutes against Girona as Barcelona struggle with injuries
arts.sum: According to an update from SPORT, Barcelona are facing a fresh wave of injury problems ahead of their weekend clash with Girona, and it could open the door for academy talent Pedro ‘Dro’ Fernandez to earn valuable first-team minutes. arts.ttl: 18-year-old La Masia right-back trains with Barcelona first-team ahead of Girona clash
arts.sum: FC Barcelona continued preparations for Saturday’s La Liga encounter against Girona at the Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys, with Hansi Flick relying on several academy talents to compensate for the team’s mounting injury list. arts.ttl: Three Barcelona prodigies train with the first-team ahead of Girona clash
arts.sum: With the international break coming to an end, Barcelona are set to resume their campaign this weekend as they take on Girona.
